assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Add_TC_to_List
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Add TC to List

assignments.name: Copy_2_of_Add_TC_to_List
assignments.label: Copy 2 of Add TC to List

formulas.name: funcB_IsTCValueCurrencyDisabled
formulas.expression: IF({!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Pocket - Angsuran" || {!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Pocket - Angsuran Installment 1" || {!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Hold Dana Angsuran" || {!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Hold Dana Angsuran Installment 1", TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: funcN_DefaultTCValueCurrency
formulas.expression: IF({!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Pocket - Angsuran Installment 1" || {!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Hold Dana Angsuran Installment 1", {!Get_Application.Survey__r.Monthly_Installment__c}, IF({!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Pocket - Angsuran" || {!TC_Name_Pocket} == "Hold Dana Angsuran", IF(ISBLANK({!TC_Value_Number}), 0, {!TC_Value_Number}) * {!Get_Application.Survey__r.Monthly_Installment__c}, {!var_NewTC.TC_Value_Currency__c}))

formulas.name: funcS_TCType
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!var_NewTC.TC_Type__c}, "Split") == TRUE, "Split Funding", IF(ISPICKVAL({!var_NewTC.TC_Type__c}, "Pocket") == TRUE, "Pocket Funding", IF(ISPICKVAL({!var_NewTC.TC_Type__c}, "Non Funding") == TRUE, "Non Funding", TEXT({!var_NewTC.TC_Type__c}))))

formulas.name: funcS_TCValueCurrency_Label
formulas.expression: IF({!TC_Name_Split} == "Pocket - Angsuran" || {!TC_Name_Split} == "Pocket - Angsuran Installment 1" || {!TC_Name_Split} == "Hold Dana Angsuran" || {!TC_Name_Split} == "Hold Dana Angsuran Installment 1", "Monthly Installment", "TC Value")
